summary.para: Specifies the opacity of the object and the drawing aspects supported by the object.

The object is completely opaque. So, for any aspect, it promises to draw the entire rectangle passed to the method. If this value is not set, the object contains transparent parts. If it also support DVASPECT_TRANSPARENT, then this aspect may be used to draw the transparent parts only.
This bit applies only to CONTENT related aspects and not to DVASPECT_ICON or DVASPECT_DOCPRINT.
The object has a solid background (consisting in a solid color, not a brush pattern). This bit is meaningful only if VIEWSTATUS_OPAQUE is set.
This bit applies only to CONTENT related aspects and not to DVASPECT_ICON or DVASPECT_DOCPRINT.
The object supports DVASPECT_OPAQUE. All methods taking a drawing aspect as a parameter can be called with this aspect.
The object supports DVASPECT_TRANSPARENT. All methods taking a drawing aspect as a parameter can be called with this aspect.
